abstract: A merger of Comcast and Time Warner Cable and a joining of AT&T and DirecTV would both pose competitive threats, Dish said.
snippet: A merger of Comcast and Time Warner Cable and a joining of AT&T and DirecTV would both pose competitive threats, Dish said.
lead_paragraph: Dish Network, a satellite television provider, has urged regulators to reject a deal between its rivals that it said would reshape the country’s television and broadband markets.

headline.main: Dish Asks F.C.C. to Block Comcast-Time Warner Cable Merger
headline.print_headline: Dish Asks F.C.C. to Block 2 Big Mergers
